correctness.rationale: Major portions of the extracted data are not traceable to the article and there is at least one schema violation. Specific issues: (1) Missing processes: The article reports ALD of both ZnO and ZnS IPLs; only a ZnO process was extracted. A separate ZnS ALD process (DEZ + H2S at 150 °C) should be included. (2) Schema violation: processParameters.plasmaPower is set to null, but the schema requires an object; it should be omitted (thermal ALD) or populated correctly only if PEALD was used. (3) Invented/unreported parameters: pressure (10 mTorr), growthPerCycle (0.3 Å), numberofCycles (50), saturation (True), nucleationPeriod (5 cycles), dosingTime (100 ms), purgeTime (100 ms), flowRates (10/100/50 sccm), carrierGas and purgingGas (N2 for ZnO), deliveryMethod, supercycleDesign—none are reported in the article. (4) Material properties largely fabricated: refractiveIndex (2.0), absorptionCoefficient (0), filmComposition elemental concentration (50%), atomicRatio (Zn:O = 1:1), roughness (0.5 nm, AFM), filmDensity (4.0 g/dm3), uniformity (5%), conformality (AR=10) are not provided in the paper. (5) Crystallinity misattribution: “amorphous” with GIXRD is discussed for the HfO2 layer, not for the ZnO IPL; assigning ZnO as amorphous is unsupported. (6) Device properties inappropriate: fieldEffectMobility, thresholdVoltage, subthresholdSwing, onOffRatio, and deviceStructure refer to TFTs; the article reports MIS capacitors, not TFT metrics—these values are incorrect and not traceable. (7) While some items match (ALD method = thermal, DEZ/H2O chemistry, reactor type, substrate, temperature 150 °C, ZnO IPL thickness ~1.5 nm, ZnO band gap ~3.1 eV by UV-Vis/Kubelka–Munk), the majority of entries are invented or misaligned. Corrections: add a separate ZnS ALD process; remove or leave unspecified any parameters not reported; fix plasmaPower by omitting it; restrict material and device properties to those stated (e.g., band gap ~3.1 eV) and avoid TFT metrics; avoid assigning crystallinity to ZnO without source evidence; remove supercycleDesign unless supported.

completeness.rationale: Very bad completeness. The article reports two ALD IPL processes (ZnO and ZnS at 150 °C on InP using DEZ with H2O or 5% H2S/95% N2; ~1.5 nm), but only one ZnO process is extracted; the ZnS ALD process is missing. Numerous fields are populated with unreported or invented values, breaking traceability: pressure (10 mmHg), dosing/purge times (100 ms), flow rates, saturation, nucleation period, growth-per-cycle and number of cycles, uniformity, conformality, roughness, film density, elemental concentrations and atomic ratio, resistivity, carrier density, mobility, and all TFT-style deviceProperties (field-effect mobility, Vth, SS, on/off) — none of these are in the paper. The optical band gap value for ZnO (~3.1 eV) is consistent, but the method is misstated (paper uses Kubelka–Munk/UV-Vis, not a Tauc plot). Schema compliance is also violated by plasmaPower set to null (should be omitted if not PEALD). To improve: add a second process for ZnS (DEZ + 5% H2S/95% N2, 150 °C, ~1.5 nm); correct the band-gap characterization method; remove or revise all unreported parameters (dosing/purge, flows, pressure, GPC/cycles, composition, morphology, density, deviceProperties) to ensure all values are directly supported by the article while maintaining schema validity.
